title: Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture       Each of the 34 Boston Harbor Islands has a rich human history. We invite you to learn more about the people, places, objects, and stories associated with each of the islands, and with the island system as a whole. Island Research The islands vividly illustrate the regionâ€™s complex past and the continual effect of natural and human processes on their habitats, their uses, even their shapes. The islands are both a recreational haven for urban residents and tourists and a highly effective laboratory in which to learn about natural change, cultural history, and stewardship. more...
